components.description: A person in traditional western wedding dress with a veil over their head.
components.title: Bride with Veil

description: A person in traditional western wedding dress with a veil over their head.
title: Bride with Veil

version.description:
Released in October 2010, Unicode 6.0 was the first version of the Unicode Standard to support emoji.

Some characters in prior versions of Unicode were retroactively updated to provide an emoji presentation. This release was the first to introduce new characters for the sole purpose of compatability with emojis being used in Japan.

emoji_net_data.category: Miscellaneous Symbols And Pictographs -> Portrait and role symbols
emoji_net_data.definition: A bride in traditional western wedding dress with a veil on her head. This veil is white for the Apple emoji, pink in the Google emoji and b http://emojipedia.org/bride-with-veil/
emoji_net_data.name: bride with veil

bn:00098171a: Delighting the senses or exciting intellectual or emotional admiration
Delighting the senses or exciting intellectual or emotional admiration.

bn:00103933a: Enjoying or showing or marked by joy or pleasure

bn:00108998a: Pleasing by delicacy or grace; not imposing

bn:00095503v: To obscure, or conceal with or as if with a veil
To conceal as with a veil.

bn:00085614v: To take as husband or wife.
To take a husband or wife.
To take as husband or wife; to take in marriage.

bn:00001530n: A woman is a female human.
An animal of the sex that produces eggs.
An adult human member of the sex that produces ova and bears young.
An adult female person (as opposed to a man)

bn:00043283n: Covering for a person or thing.
A veil is an article of clothing or cloth hanging that is intended to cover some part of the head or face, or an object of some significance.
A garment that covers the head and face
A covering for a person or thing; as, a caul; a nun's veil; a paten veil; an altar veil; a Moslem veil.

bn:00013066n: A woman who has recently been married

bn:00053518n: The state of being married; matrimony.
Marriage; the state of being married.
The act or state of marriage.
Conflict of marriage laws is the conflict of laws regarding marriage in different jurisdictions.
The state of being a married couple voluntarily joined for life (or until divorce)

bn:00045458n: A ceremony celebrating the beginning of a marriage, during which the marrying parties exchanges vows.
The social event at which the ceremony of marriage is performed
Marriage ceremony; ritual officially celebrating the beginning of a marriage.
A wedding; a ceremony in which people wed.
A wedding is a ceremony where people are united in marriage.
Ceremony where people are united in marriage

bn:00053531n: A wife is a female partner in a continuing marital relationship.
Female partner in a marital relationship
A married woman, especially in relation to her spouse.
A married woman; a man's partner in marriage
A wife is a female spouse, or participant in a marriage.
